page.title: 11A June Wedding.
page.content: I was a{bridesmaid}on a June Wedding. My{friends}all came to see me at the Church.Last October I was measured for my bridesmaid's{dress.}It takes a long time to arrange all the details for a {white wedding.}Stephen was a{pageboy, Kathy and Samantha were{flowergirls. There were two other{bridesmaids,}a {groomsman,}a{best man}and the{bride and{groom.}The bride arrived last, {late,}with her{father}in a Rolls Royce. First there was the Marriage {Service.} Then we made a lovely {procession}as we walked down the aisle through our friends. There were lots of{photographs}taken. We drove to a {reception}in a hotel.There was a lovely{meal,}some{speeches}and a lot of{fun.} It was all over when the bride and groom left on their {honeymoon}holiday to Majorica.
